titles.title: Recognizing 2016 as the year of the 100th anniversary of the National Association of Secondary School Principals.
Recognizing 2016 as the year of the 100th anniversary of the National Association of Secondary School Principals.

action.text: Referred to the House Committee on Education and the Workforce.

bill.summary: Recognizes the 100th anniversary of the National Association of Secondary School Principals, and commends the association for its efforts and service.
